item.title: PEAK: How to Get Cool Cucumber Badge
item.description:
The Cool Cucumber Badge is one of the latest achievements added to PEAK , and it has quickly become a favorite challenge among players. As the name suggests, this badge is all about staying calm under pressure. More specifically, this badge is about keeping your heat level low while crossing the scorching Mesa biome . If you’re trying to unlock this achievement but are struggling in the harsh desert environment, this guide will walk you through everything you need to know to get the Cool Cucumber Badge in PEAK .

How To Get Cool Cucumber Badge in PEAK

To get the Cool Cucumber Badge, you need to reach the Mesa Campfire without ever letting your heat level rise above 10%. On paper, this sounds easy. In practice, the Mesa biome is filled with hazards, from blazing sunlight and shifting shadows to dynamite, tornadoes, and Antlion attacks.

The moment you set foot in its scorching desert, your Heat bar begins to climb. With the 10% cap in place, there’s no room for error. To get the Cool Cucumber Badge, you need to manage your heat level using the right strategies:

Travel At Night

The Mesa biome has a day/night cycle . When night falls, the burning sun is no longer a threat, meaning your heat won’t build up as quickly. This strategy is best for players who aren’t rushing through the climb and are comfortable taking their time. You can find a safe, shaded area and simply wait until nightfall. Once it’s dark, you’ll have a short window for safe climbing. This way, your heat level will stay under 10%.

Use Heat-Protection Items

Players who prefer to move during the day can use heat-protection items on their run through Mesa. These items can be found in luggage bags scattered around the biome . The best items to use are Sunscreen and Parasol. When used correctly, these can help you stay under the 10% threshold, and cross exposed areas without overheating.

Once you’ve carefully made your way through the Mesa and reach the Mesa Campfire with your heat level safely under 10%, the Cool Cucumber Badge will unlock instantly.

The Cool Cucumber Badge is only available while the Mesa biome is active. At the time of writing, Mesa has replaced Alpine, but this rotation is temporary. Once the update cycles out and Alpine returns, you’ll need to wait for Mesa to rotate back in before you can earn this badge in PEAK .

item.title: Roblox: Death Ball Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Death Ball Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Death Ball
  • Where to Find More Death Ball Codes

It's often said that imitation is the sincerest form of flattery, in which case, the developers of Death Ball must really like Blade Ball . The two games are incredibly similar, although many Roblox players now seem to prefer the former, finding its gameplay to be a lot more exciting than what's on offer in the original.

As is the case with Blade Ball , there were once plenty of Death Ball codes that players could redeem for free Gems and other great rewards. Roblox players should be sure to redeem these codes as soon as possible, though, as the game is updated often, which can lead to codes expiring at a moment's notice.

Updated August 16, 2025, by Tom Bowen: The Bizarre Cosmos update just dropped, and with it came two new Death Ball codes. By redeeming GALAXY and BIZARRE , players can get 500 Crystals and 50 Cosmic Orbs. After doing so, they should take a moment or two to bookmark this page so that they can check back here every now and again, as we're always on the lookout for new codes for Death Ball and will update the list below with any that we find.

All Death Ball Codes

Working Death Ball Codes

  • GALAXY - Redeem this code for 500 Crystals (NEW)
  • BIZARRE - Redeem this code for 50 Cosmic Orbs (NEW)

How to Redeem Codes for Death Ball

The process for redeeming Death Ball codes is relatively straightforward and not too dissimilar from redeeming codes in other Roblox games. However, those having trouble can refer to the step-by-step instructions below to help speed up the process.

  1. Launch Death Ball .
  2. Press the "More" button at the top of the screen.
  3. Select "Codes" from the drop-down menu.
  4. Type or paste the code into the box provided and then press "Verify". Alternatively, players can just hit enter.

Where to Find More Death Ball Codes

Players can find new codes for Death Ball in a few different places. For starters, it's a good idea to join the game's official Discord server, both for new codes and information about the game. Players should also follow Sub on Twitter, as they sometimes tweet about the game. However, the best place to find new Death Ball codes is arguably right here, as this guide will be updated regularly as and when new codes become available. As such, it's a good idea to bookmark this page and check back here often so as to avoid missing out on future freebies.

item.title: Roblox CEO's Account Was Seemingly Deleted, But It's Back Now
item.description:
Controversial Roblox CEO David Baszucki's account for the popular online gaming platform had seemingly been suspended or otherwise deleted for several hours, but it's currently back up and running again. Baszucki has been an instrumental figurehead for Roblox for more than 20 years, and the temporary disappearance of his account raised a lot of eyebrows among the game platform's community.

Baszucki established Roblox alongside co-founder Erik Cassel in 2004, providing a free-to-play gaming and game creation platform that has grown immensely since it was released to the public in 2006. Player counts for games like Grow a Garden have surpassed Fortnite , while Brookhaven RP , Blox Fruits , and Adopt Me have each registered at least 40 billion visits as of July 2025, according to Statista.

Roblox CEO David Baszucki's Profile Disappears and Reappears

Amid Roblox showing rising user growth and engagement, some players had noted that Baszucki's official Roblox profile appeared to have recently disappeared from the platform on August 15, 2025, though it was once again visible the next day. The CEO does not seem to have publicly addressed the reason why players had been unable to find his profile for several hours. His social media presence around the time during which his profile appeared to be unavailable was centered around Roblox 's safety initiatives and rules regarding romantic and sexual content, while there has been no activity on his Twitter profile since the account's reappearance.

The disappearing account comes at an odd time, as Baszucki seems to be bearing the brunt of the backlash over child safety concerns regarding the platform. These concerns ramped up significantly in early August after the parents of a 13-year-old girl sued Roblox following her alleged kidnapping by a 37-year-old who had been posing as a teenager on the platform. A subsequent lawsuit filed by Louisiana Attorney General Liz Murril accuses Roblox of "permitting and perpetuating an online environment in which child predators thrive," calling out numerous safety concerns which include the lack of parental consent or age verification to access the platform.

There is currently a petition calling for the Roblox CEO's resignation or removal on Change.org that has amassed more than 92,000 online signatures. This petition addresses many of the concerns mentioned in the above lawsuits. To Catch a Predator' s Chris Hansen is also reportedly working on a documentary concerning Roblox .

item.title: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Players Will Be Able to Get Another Shiny Legendary Soon
item.description:
Pokemon Scarlet and Violet trainers have successfully unlocked another Shiny Treasures of Ruin distribution. In the coming days, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players can connect to the Internet to claim Shiny Chien-Pao for their collections, along with some bonus Tera Shards.

Known as the Ruinous Pokemon, Chien-Pao is one of the four Treasures of Ruin from the Paldea region, a Legendary quartet that was sealed away in shrines. Chien-Pao is usually an Ice and Dark dual-type, with high attack and speed stats that allow it to cut through opponents with swift precision. From August 3 to 17, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players can test themselves against a Shiny variant of Chien-Pao in Five-Star Tera Raid dens throughout Paldea. Shiny Chien-Pao has the Ice-type as its Tera type, and cannot normally be caught after defeating it in a Tera Raid.

As Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players utilized strong Fighting types like Iron Hands and Annihilape to defeat Shiny Chien-Pao, a collective goal was reached with days to spare. Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players collectively defeated Shiny Chien-Pao over 2.9 million times as of August 11, nearly six days before Shiny Chien-Pao's raid window ends. Ergo, for defeating Shiny Chien-Pao a collective one million times, a Mystery Gift distribution event to claim Shiny Chien-Pao will begin on Thursday, August 21, at 8:00 PM Eastern . Additionally, 400 Tera Shards will be rewarded as a bonus gift for defeating Shiny Chien-Pao an additional 400,000 times beyond the first million. Once the Mystery Gift window for Shiny Chien-Pao is open, Pokemon trainers have until September 30 to claim the second Shiny Treasure of Ruin via the Internet.

Current and Upcoming Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Mystery Gift Events (August 16, 2025)

  • Shiny Chien-Pao - N/A (Get via Internet, begins August 21, expires September 30)
  • Shiny Chien-Pao Bonus 400 Tera Shards- N/A (Get via Internet, begins August 21, expires September 30)
  • Shiny Wo-Chien - N/A (Get via Internet, expires September 30)
  • Shiny Wo-Chien Bonus 400 Tera Shards- N/A (Get via Internet, expires September 30)
  • Luca Ceribelli's Farigiraf - W0RLDSARM0RTA1L (expires August 22)
  • Elemental Evolution Stones - ELEMENTST0NES (expires January 1, 2026)
  • Sandwich Ingredients - P3LD3AP1CN1C (expires January 19, 2026)
  • Kitakami Rotom Phone Case - NE0R0T0MC0VER (no expiration date)
  • Mythical Pecha Berry - N/A (Get via Internet, no expiration date)
  • Scarlet Rotom Phone Case - SB00KC0VER (Pokemon Scarlet only, no expiration date)
  • Scarlet Tracksuit - STRACKSU1T (Pokemon Scarlet only, no expiration date)
  • Violet Rotom Phone Case - VB00KC0VER (Pokemon Violet only, no expiration date)
  • Violet Tracksuit - VTRACKSU1T (Pokemon Violet only, no expiration date)

A Nintendo Switch Online membership is not necessary to download any Mystery Gift offers in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet . Along with Shiny Chien-Pao, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet trainers can also download Shiny Wo-Chien, the first Shiny Treasure of Ruin, even if they did not participate in either of the Tera Raid battle windows. Compared to the current Shiny Chien-Pao raid window, Shiny Wo-Chien was defeated over 3.5 million times days before its spotlight ended.

More members of the Shiny Treasures of Ruin will be available to battle in Tera Raid dens soon, with Shiny Ting-Lu arriving on August 17 at 8:00 PM Eastern. Between that and an ongoing Farigiraf Mystery Gift distribution event, now is an excellent time for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players to add more pages to their Pokedexes.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Has 6 Big Games Releasing in September 2025
item.description:
Nintendo Switch 2 owners wondering what's next for the system will want to mark their calendars for the six big games releasing in September 2025. The Nintendo Switch 2 got off to a hot start thanks to Mario Kart World , and it kept that momentum going strong with Donkey Kong Bananza in July. Unfortunately, August has proven to be rather flat for the Switch 2, but maybe the new games coming in September will help make up for it.

Drag x Drive is the new first-party Nintendo game that released for the Switch 2 in August, and it has earned mixed reviews, to say the least. Kirby and the Forgotten Land is on deck for a Switch 2 upgrade later this month that will include brand-new story content, but otherwise, there isn't much for fans to look forward to this month. September seems to have a bit more for Switch 2 owners to check out, and there's a chance that there's a surprise waiting in the wings as well.

There are six big games confirmed to be releasing for the Nintendo Switch 2 in September 2025 at the time of this writing. Star Wars Outlaws is coming to the Switch 2 on September 4, while survival-horror game Cronos: The New Dawn is launching on September 5. That same day, NBA 2K26 is coming to the Switch 2. Then there's a big gap until EA Sports FC 26 lands on Switch 2 on September 26 with Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac launching the same day. Finally, the Switch 2 September 2025 new releases will come to an end when Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles launches on September 30.

Upcoming Switch 2 Games for September 2025

  • Star Wars Outlaws - September 4
  • Cronos: The New Dawn - September 5
  • NBA 2K26 - September 5
  • EA Sports FC 26 - September 26
  • Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac - September 26
  • Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles - September 30

Nintendo likes to release at least one first-party game per month, give or take, which is why the lack of one for September 2025 is puzzling. There are rumors that a Nintendo Direct could happen in early September, and if so, perhaps a new Switch 2 game for September 2025 will be announced at the event. As it stands, there are multiple Switch 2 games planned for 2025 that are currently without release dates.

Kirby Air Riders is a Switch 2 exclusive without a solid launch date, as is Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment , though the latter is expected to come in December. And while Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is technically a Switch 1 game, it's getting a special Switch 2 Edition that will come with major enhancements. Like Kirby Air Riders and Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment , Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is still missing its release date as well. While Nintendo fans wait for more news on that front, they can look forward to the six big games that have been confirmed for September 2025 so far.
